angstd.model.io
Class AbstractDataWriter<T extends AngstdData>

java.lang.Object
  angstd.model.io.AbstractDataWriter<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataWriter<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
XdomWriter
public abstract class AbstractDataWriter<T extends AngstdData>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataWriter<T>

Abstract class AbstractDataWriter is the basic implementation for the DataWriter interface. A BufferedWriter object is created for a file which is then passed to the abstract method writeData(). This method must be implemented by a subclass and should be responsible for the actual writing.

Because the type of data which has to be written into a file is generic the requested type must implement the empty AngstdData interface.

Author:
Andreas Held
